text: Melanie Jayne Lynskey (born 16 May 1977) is a New Zealand actress who has starred in lots of movies, including Hello I Must be Going, But I'm a Cheerleader and Heavenly Creatures. She was in the sitcom Two and a Half Men and in other television programs. She was born in New Plymouth. == Other websites == * Category:Entertainers from North Island Category:New Zealand movie actors Category:New Zealand television actors Category:1977 births Category:Living people
title: Melanie Lynskey
